title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts on compensation equity analysis needs. Identify data sources, legal and regulatory requirements, and key performance indicators (KPIs) for measuring equity.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data ingestion, processing, analysis, reporting components, and security considerations. The architecture should be modular, scalable, and maintainable.

title: Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop components for ingesting and preprocessing compensation data from various sources (e.g., HR systems, payroll systems).

title: Compensation Equity Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core engine for analyzing compensation data and identifying potential inequities based on defined criteria (e.g., gender, race, experience).

title: Reporting and Visualization
description: Develop components for generating reports and visualizations to present compensation equity analysis results.

title: Data Security and Privacy
description: Implement measures to ensure data security and privacy, including encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and execute comprehensive testing (unit, integration, system, and acceptance testing) to ensure the application meets requirements and functions as expected.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, automate the deployment process, and implement monitoring and logging for the application.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the application, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
